title: IMO Announces IMO Anywhere - a New Mobile Terminology Solution for Searching ICD-10-CM from a Smartphone, Tablet, or Desktop
text:
IMO Announces IMO Anywhere - a New Mobile Terminology Solution for Searching ICD-10-CM from a Smartphone, Tablet, or Desktop [October 01, 2015] IMO Announces IMO Anywhere - a New Mobile Terminology Solution for Searching ICD-10-CM from a Smartphone, Tablet, or Desktop Tweet 
Intelligent Medical Objects, Inc. (IMO), developer of the most-widely used and physician-preferred terminology service for electronic health records (EHR) systems, announced the release of the IMO Anywhere terminology solution giving physicians and healthcare information technology professionals access to the market-leading medical terminology service without being tethered to their EHR system. This engineering breakthrough allows end-users to search for ICD-9-CM, ICD-10-CM and SNOMED CT® codes on any web browser, including Apple iOS and Android ( News - Alert ) devices. The ICD-10-CM features include complete access to IMO's guided search with access to thousands of additional new qualifiers available in ICD-10-CM. 
"This is a remarkable achievement - the entire IMO Problem (IT)™ Terminology enhanced ICD-10 offering right in your hand!" said Frank Naeymi-Rad, PhD, MBA, Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of IMO. He continued: "We want our customers to know that we are fully supporting their transition to ICD-10. With the IMO Anywhere solution we've made it easy to navigate complex ICD-10 qualifiers anytime, anywhere, so you can focus on quality patient care while we deal with the complexities of vocabulary management." 
With the IMO Anywhere solution, clinicians can look up the right clinical codes without access to their clinical systems. Featuring full ICD-10 drill-down functionality, the IMO Anywhere solution makes mobile searching fast, easy and clinically accurate, no matter where the point-of-care happens to be. In large health systems, the IMO Anywhere solution is a single, easily accessible "source of truth" for ICD and SNOMED® coding. Laboratory oranizations will find the IMO Anywhere solution invaluable to bridge the gap between receiving billing codes and patient symptoms and diagnoses. Health Information Management professionals will like having a current resource available anytime without having to refer to outdated reference books and manuals. 
In addition to its clinical usage, the IMO Anywhere solution serves as a valuable, hands-on ICD-10 transition training platform. It displays the same live content clinicians see in their IMO-enabled electronic health record system. Just like the integrated version, the IMO Anywhere solution is regularly updated to provide the most current terminology maps. 
For a limited time, IMO is offering a free trial now through the end of October 2015, click here for more information: http://bit.ly/1KwlxnT 
About IMO 
Intelligent Medical Objects, Inc. has created the most widely-accepted medical terminology solution for the development, management, and licensing of medical vocabularies and software applications at healthcare organizations worldwide. IMO terminology products are used by more than 4,000 hospitals, major academic medical centers and 400,000 physicians daily, and this trusted terminology platform supports innovation by provider systems. IMO medical vocabulary and mapping products effectively capture clinical intent and help EHRs preserve and communicate this across the entire spectrum of care. IMO clinical terms are seamlessly mapped to all standard coding systems including ICD-9, ICD-10 and SNOMED®. The accuracy of IMO's interface terminology was found to be "nearly perfect" in an independent study published by the US Centers for Disease Control: http://1.usa.gov/18j7xxw .
